KPI_noPeopleVolunteering.name: People volunteering time
KPI_noPeopleVolunteering.definition: Number of people volunteering time: People that have volunteered at least four hours during the annual reporting period.

KPI_noPaidStaff.name: Paid staff
KPI_noPaidStaff.definition: Number of paid staff: People who work with a National Society or the Secretariat for a minimum of three months and are remunerated.

KPI_noPeopleDonatingBlood.name: People donating blood
KPI_noPeopleDonatingBlood.definition: Number of people donating blood: People that have donated blood at least once during the reporting period.

KPI_noLocalUnits.name: Local units
KPI_noLocalUnits.definition: Number of local units: National Society subdivisions that work directly with the community â€“ this can include local chapters, branches, regional and intermediate offices, and headquarters.

KPI_IncomeLC (CHF).name: Income (in CHF)
KPI_IncomeLC (CHF).definition: Total income received: the fiscal value of money, material goods, and services a National Society receives during the fiscal year (in CHF).

KPI_expenditureLC (CHF).name: Expenditure (in CHF)
KPI_expenditureLC (CHF).definition: Total expenditure: the fiscal value of money, material goods, and services a National Society spends during the fiscal year (in CHF).

KPI_noPeopleReachedDisaster.name: People reached by disaster response and early recovery programmes

KPI_noPeopleReachedAllServices.name: People reached by all services
KPI_noPeopleReachedAllServices.definition: Number of people reached by Long Term Services and Development Programmes: Direct and indirect recipients and people covered by Federation services counted, disaggregated by service areas.

KPI_noPeopleCoveredPreparedness.name: People covered
KPI_noPeopleCoveredPreparedness.definition: Number of people covered by Preparedness and Risk Reduction Programmes

dataCollectors.lead: To get started with the data collection for your National Society, please log in.

nationalSocietiesPreview.lead: Explore the dataset for each National Society, and download PDF profiles for further sharing.

overviewPreview.lead: Get the big picture with the IFRC at a glance, and see how the largest humanitarian network looks.

contact.title: Contact
contact.lead: If you have feedback, questions and/or corrections, please write to the FDRS team.
